dcterms:creator: M. Cooke
J. Barker
S. Cunningham
X. Shao
dcterms:description: The Grid audio-visual corpus contains frontal videos of 27 different speakers, with each speaker providing 1000 utterances structured to contain a command, a color, a preposition, a letter, a digit, and an adverb. The dataset is used to train a system that generates talking face landmarks from acoustic speech.
dcterms:title: Grid audio-visual corpus

dcterms:creator: S. Richie
C. Warburton
M. Carter
dcterms:description: The LDC Audiovisual Database of Spoken American English contains videos of 10 female and 4 male speakers, totaling 1316 utterances. The dataset is used for objective and subjective evaluations of the generated talking face landmarks.
dcterms:title: LDC Audiovisual Database of Spoken American English
